data.text: Nan borim, nɨ deraghvɨra kuarim atɨgh nan akam baragh.
Eghtɨ nɨ deragh tuaviba tuisɨghamin arazim gɨfoghɨva egh tuavir aghuimɨn gɨn mangam.
Nɨ fogh, amizitam uan pam ategh, nɨ gakueghsɨ, a nɨ apezeperɨva akar avɨribar nɨ mɨkɨmɨva egh nɨ gekuigham.
Eghtɨ nɨ an mɨgɨrɨgɨabar gɨn mangɨghɨva, gɨn an akabagh nɨghnɨghtɨ da bar nɨn ikuvigham.
Ezɨ amizir kamaghɨn amim, a nɨn akua Gumazamizir Oveaghuezibar Nguibamɨn zui. Kar ovever tuavimra.
A ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuimɨn zuir tuavimɨn mangasa nɨghnɨzir puvatɨ.
Nan boriba, deraghvɨra kuariba arighɨva nan akam baragh,
Nɨ bar amizir kamaghɨn amimɨn saghon ikɨ.
Nɨ a bagh mangɨgh, egh uan ziar aghuim gasɨghasigham.
Bizir aghuir nɨ pamtem ingara iniziba,
Eghtɨ arɨmariam nɨ inightɨ nɨ bar agharim guragham.
Egh nɨ kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, “Kɨ bar ongani. Kɨ manmaghsua otuegha aghuzir akabar aghua.
Gumaziba aghuzir akabar na mɨgei,
Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn bar moghɨra ikufi,
Kɨ ua nɨ mɨgei, nɨ gumazir igharazimɨn mozir dɨpam aneman markɨ.
Nɨ amizir igharaziba ko dakutɨ, me boriba bateghtɨ, borir kaba gɨn nɨn akuraghan kogham.
Nɨ amizir igharaziba ko dakutɨ, nɨn boriba nɨn akurvaghan kogham.
God nɨn amuim deraghvɨram a damutɨ, a mati nɨn mozir dɨpam,
An ganganim bar derazɨ an araziba bar aghungi.
Nan borim, nɨ manmaghsua gumazir igharazimɨn amuim gɨnɨghnɨghvɨra ikia a gifuegha, an otemningɨn suighasa?
Nɨ fogh, Ikiavɨra Itir God nɨ amir biziba a bar dar gari,
Gumazimɨn arazir kuram,
Kamagh amir gumazim, a uan ifongiam dɨkabɨrir puvatɨgha arazir bar onganim gami,
